channel.title: About on Eric Wait
channel.description: Recent content in About on Eric Wait

item.title: Full Life Journey
item.description: I was born in the 80’s in a mid-size town in Wisconsin. I feel like my start was quite unassuming. My family had a heavy work ethic and would unwind in true Wisconsin fashion at the end of each week. I spent many of my earlier days playing on or around the Chippewa river. This is where I learned to waterski and enjoy the outdoors. I worked hard through my high school years to the point where I dropped some of my extra curricular activities. Hard work and the meager wealth that would bring was always the emphasis from my parents. I wanted more though. I found that joining the Air National Guard and attending college was a good compromise. The military would show that I could work hard and college would help me learn something that could not be had through experience alone.
